title: I can't stop playing assassin Vi. I thirst for the burst.
body:
{{champion:254}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3172}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3026}} 

It's too fun. Q auto E Titanic Active combo deletes people. Secondary Role: Assassin

replies.body:
Good luck trying to touch me!

{{champion:103}}{{item:3165}}  {{item:3089}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}}

God damn Ahri mains playing her because they made her their waifu.

Oh, and also because she's hard to catch.

EDIT: Urgod forbid I make a joke and somebody takes it like one.
Or... because she's fun to play? I mean, games are meant to be fun right?

> [{quoted}](name=If Ahri Was Real,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=34YIE2wL,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-11T20:24:15.517+0000)
>
> Or... because she's fun to play? I mean, games are meant to be fun right?

Not League. If you're not approaching this game with a grim stoicism you're playing the game wrong.

lich bane > ludens
That's... that's not an assassin build (_quakes in fear_ )

Why you scared then?
because no one likes champs like Nasus that go as tanky as your vi build but still instakill squishies. Not raging just explaining.

>

Who needs last whisper when you can have your titanic hydra active+e+triforce auto with an IE crit???

> [{quoted}](name=BakedLotion,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=34YIE2wL,comment-id=0000000000020000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-11T21:28:23.485+0000)
>
> Who needs last whisper when you can have your titanic hydra active+e+triforce auto with an IE crit???

But what if you don't crit?
well probably because your apparently not allowed to have an opinion on the boards without taking stupid amounts of backlash
Yeah if you wanna lose that you gotta go tot he reddi- wait.
What order do you build that in? I usually do {{item:3078}} > {{item:3053}}  > TANK. But this is interesting, wanna try it. So what's your order?

> [{quoted}](name=bvcderrttyyhjjjk,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=34YIE2wL,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-10-12T10:55:17.706+0000)
>
> What order do you build that in? I usually do {{item:3078}} > {{item:3053}}  > TANK. But this is interesting, wanna try it. So what's your order?

Well I go 21/9/0 with flat armor quints, armor pen marks, scaling armor seals, and scaling mr glyphs.

The last few normal games I went:
{{item:3077}} -> {{item:1001}} -> {{item:3748}} -> {{item:3078}} -> {{item:3006}} -> {{item:3035}} -> {{item:3053}} -> {{item:3071}}
and then sold {{item:3006}} for {{item:3172}} .

I was mid lane and top lane not jungle.

When I jungle I usually only upgrade {{item:1039}} to {{item:3713}} and don't upgrade past that and go straight for {{item:3077}} and then sell the {{item:3713}} later when I need an item slot. If you do want to complete your jungle item just go {{item:3707}} and skip the {{item:3035}} as your third item, and instead just sell the {{item:3714}} for {{item:3035}} late game.
marking for interest
Devourer Vi is op

That isn't assassin Vi lol.

That's juggernaut bruiser Vi.

Your just not used to having items that let you do damage without being squishy.
Let's be honest... if you're going adc build on a fighter tank, dead sion is the only way to go (not live sion, just dead.)

since  you got {{item:3078}} you also need {{item:3031}} 
you build crit item so its good to get a bit more crits and infinity is perfect choice
{{item:3077}} gives extra early burst 

from this point onward everything else is conditional

i dont even understand why people build this crap {{item:3714}} on vi

**Denting Blows - scaling % health damage / 20 % armor reduction / 50% attack speed **

Denting Blows is an **on-hit effect**!
Excessive Force is a conic area of effect **on-hit effect**! 

this thing with devourer and blade of the ruined king would make vi super tank buster
{{item:3707}}  {{item:3074}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3158}} I'm aware it's a tad strange but it's fun af if you're just messing around and deletes people with an E or two. xD
